THE CONFERENCE
OCTOBER 19TH 2019

UX-LIVE IS A DIVISION OF TECHCIRCUS.IO. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED - 2019

UX-LIVE is a Tech Circus event. We are an independent company that produces educational events for the community of digital design, product & UX. We collaborate with global clients, agencies and organisations to bring together the leading experts in the digital market, and we then use these connections to guarantee high-quality educational events, training and content for professional growth. Find out more by visiting our website here
